Sentencas: La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3 (LSGM) thin film electrolytes of 1.6-5 mu m thicknesses were fabricated on Ni-based anode supports by RF magnetron sputtering using a sintered LSGM target and post annealing in air.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of LSGM thin film electrolyte by RF magnetron sputtering for LT-SOFCS

Sentencas: The effect of sputtering gas pressure on the LSGM thin film density was examined.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of LSGM thin film electrolyte by RF magnetron sputtering for LT-SOFCS

Sentencas: The effect of flatness of the Ni-based anode supports on the gas tightness and oxygen-ion conductivity was clarified.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of LSGM thin film electrolyte by RF magnetron sputtering for LT-SOFCS

Sentencas: RF magnetron sputtering was conducted in a mixed gas of Ar and O-2.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of LSGM thin film electrolyte by RF magnetron sputtering for LT-SOFCS

Sentencas: The Ni-based anode supports were heated to 400 degrees C during the deposition.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of LSGM thin film electrolyte by RF magnetron sputtering for LT-SOFCS

Sentencas: The post annealing was carried out at 1100 degrees C in air.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of LSGM thin film electrolyte by RF magnetron sputtering for LT-SOFCS

Sentencas: The microstructure of the fabricated LSGM thin films and compatibility between the fabricated LSGM thin film and the Ni-based anode support were examined using FE-SEM, EDX and XRD.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of LSGM thin film electrolyte by RF magnetron sputtering for LT-SOFCS

Sentencas: The gas tightness of the fabricated LSGM thin film electrolytes was confirmed by measuring the open circuit voltage.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of LSGM thin film electrolyte by RF magnetron sputtering for LT-SOFCS

Sentencas: The composition of the fabricated LSGM thin films was determined by ICP analysis.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of LSGM thin film electrolyte by RF magnetron sputtering for LT-SOFCS

Sentencas: The fabricated thin film electrolytes, which were annealed at 1000-1100 degrees C, consisted of the LSGM single phase with the perovskite structure.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of LSGM thin film electrolyte by RF magnetron sputtering for LT-SOFCS

Sentencas: There was no element migration between the LSGM thin film and the Ni-based anode support.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of LSGM thin film electrolyte by RF magnetron sputtering for LT-SOFCS

Sentencas: The fabricated LSGM thin films were gas tight.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of LSGM thin film electrolyte by RF magnetron sputtering for LT-SOFCS

Sentencas: The density of the LSGM thin film fabricated under the sputtering gas pressure of 1 Pa were higher than those sputtered at 2 Pa.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of LSGM thin film electrolyte by RF magnetron sputtering for LT-SOFCS

Sentencas: The data clearly showed the feasibility of the RF magnetron sputtering method to directly fabricate the LSGM thin film electrolyte on the Ni-based anode.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of LSGM thin film electrolyte by RF magnetron sputtering for LT-SOFCS
Synthesis and characterization of LSGM thin film electrolyte by RF magnetron sputtering for LT-SOFCS
Synthesis and characterization of LSGM thin film electrolyte by RF magnetron sputtering for LT-SOFCS
